page.title: 16ROWLANDS CASTLE CLUBS
page.content: {Red cross society}- Very active group who, as well as studying for their first aid certificates, man local events and help any casualties. Also a medical loan dept at St. Johns School. {Cricket Club}-another thriving club with 2 teams who played 39 games between them in 1984. {Other Clubs/teams:-} darts, football, tug-of-war. {Scout Group}-The cub and scout sections are thriving and membership is growing although both have room for more boys. The venture unit is very small, although those that belong take part in many activities. The Guide and Brownie packs are also doing well. {Women's Institute}- Another very active group well supported and due to celebrate 40 years in 1986.
